attributes.additional_details:
we want government to make rules stricter on breeding, owning, selling and handling this dog making sure that this dog is given the correct and loving home, the right training and being sold and bred properly 
owners who cannot control this breed or are not looking after them and getting the correct training are to be arrested or fined and not allowed to own another dog. 
In other ways to ensure people’s safety, Making sure if out in a public environment , around children and people your enabling the use of a strong collar that cannot come loose in able to have better control of your dog if necessary.
attributes.background: we do not want the government neither parliament to ban this breed of dog as it will not solve the problem at all

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
